TopicTitle: Unable to click on custom part in VAB/SPH

Articles.Content: Hey there, just began working on Pulsar tech parts, and noticed i am currently unable to click on the part at all, in all cases. can drag it from parts catalog and attach, but unable to grab from then on. Any ideas?

You haven't added a collision mesh to your parts.

Check out my brief tutorial here for some instructions on how to add one.

mesh colider was applied...odd...let me go in and check that

Edit: Somehow somewhere it was disabled. I added it, but it was inactive.

Edited April 20, 2013 by Zaeo
